data.actual_result: The submit button appears and you can submit an empty filter. Doing so will result in a failed search with a broken manifying glass
data.expected_result: The submit button should stay hidden until you put actual text after the filter
data.short_description: When you add a space after a search filter, the submit search button will pop up and will break the search if pressed
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Search in a server - Choose any filter option (in, from, etc)  - After the filter is inserted, notice the button to submit the search isn't here yet. I guess this is to prevent ability to submit empty filters - ... But you can bypass that by simply adding spaces after the filter colons, like so: `"from:    "`
